biz.onomato.frskydash.db

Class AbstractDBAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.onomato.frskydash.db.AbstractDBAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrSkyDatabase

    public abstract class AbstractDBAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    general methods for DB management. Holds the SQL statements and methods for managing connections
